mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_no asc
select * from notice where notice_title like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' order by notice_no asc
select * from notice where userid like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' order by notice_no asc
select * from notice where notice_no = #{ notice_no }
mapper.delete: delete from notice where notice_no = #{ notice_no }
mapper.insert: insert into notice (NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, USERID, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_UPFILE, NOTICE_REFILE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_READCOUNT) values ((select max(notice_no) + 1 from notice), #{ notice_title }, #{ userid }, sysdate, #{ notice_upfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ notice_refile, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ notice_content }, default )
